title: Mithril arrow

properties.name: description
properties.value: Mithril arrows are arrows made of mithril. A willow bow or better is required to shoot mithril arrows. Stronger than steel arrows, mithril arrows can be made at level 45 Fletching by using mithril arrowtips on headless arrows. Doing so grants 112.5 experience for every batch of 15 arrows made. They can be bought from Lowe's Archery Emporium in Varrock.

Mithril arrows are arrows made of mithril. A willow bow or better is required to shoot mithril arrows. Stronger than steel arrows, mithril arrows can be made at level 45 Fletching by using mithril arrowtips on headless arrows. Doing so grants 112.5 experience for every batch of 15 arrows made. They can be bought from Lowe's Archery Emporium in Varrock.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
22 August 2006
(update)
  • The extra strong poisoned variant was renamed from "Mithril arrow(+)" to "Mithril arrow(p+)".
  • The super strong poisoned variant was renamed from "Mithril arrow(s)" to "Mithril arrow(p++)".
29 March 2005
(update)

The item was made available to free-to-play players.
